body:
ss4chris I sure hope so, this has gotten 10 times hotter.  This is an arc with a well fleshed out otaku girl Jun, that never knew her attractiveness because she never went out, finding a good looking man Mayumi, becoming obsessive over how much she believes in this relationship as she actually grows further out of his league but still wants him, because she wasn't looking for just a tall man but a good personality (in this she was questionable, but succeeds), great looks, that is social and treasures her.

Honestly the fleshing out of the personalities was actually pretty deep, even the Mayumi has something going on, if you notice the discrepancy between his first interaction, and this version, and I hope Jun gets even bigger.  Jun's personality is just what makes this series sing though.
I don't get it but it's good!
Oh, Oh my gosh, she got bigger while having sex with him... with that personality and the fact that she's the awkward shut-in type, that's so hot.
is there going to be a 3rd part?
These are always so good until you get the sex dialog then it's just a virgin who doesn't socialize trying to imagine what they would say
It appears to not be complete, where is the rest?
